sections.heading: 7121 through 7135 of this title shall be known and may be cited as the "Cemetery Merchandise Trust Act"
sections.text: Added by Laws 1989, c. 297, ยง 17, eff. Nov. 1, 1989. Amended by Laws 2010, c. 58, ยง 11, eff. July 1, 2010. Renumbered from ยง 301 of Title 8 by Laws 2010, c. 58, ยง 38, eff. July 1, 2010. Amended by
